channel.title: This Week in Rust - This Week in Rust

item.title: This Week in Rust 423
item.description: Hello and welcome to another issue of This Week in Rust! Rust is a programming language empowering everyone to build reliable and efficient software. This is a weekly summary of its progress and community. Want something mentioned? Tweet us at @ThisWeekInRust or send us a pull request. Want to get …
item.dc:creator: TWiR Contributors
